backend/main.mo: Motoko actor implementing expense and earnings management with CRUD operations, monthly filtering, category-wise totals, and savings calculations using Map data structures.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting five implemented frontend features (expense form, earnings form, category breakdown, monthly summary, expense list) with associated files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON object containing one-line summaries of all frontend source files including components, hooks, and configuration files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom OKLCH color palette defining warm amber/orange/rose theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the Monthly Expenditure Tracker application with root div and module script reference.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application component orchestrating month/year selection, summary dashboard, category breakdown, and tabbed interface for expenses and earnings with themed layout and header.
frontend/src/components/CategoryBreakdow: Component displaying expense breakdown by category with icons, progress bars, percentages, and amounts sorted by spending using predefined category colors and icons.
frontend/src/components/EarningsForm.tsx: Form component for setting monthly earnings with month/year selectors, displays existing earnings if present, and validates input before submission.
frontend/src/components/ExpenseEditDialo: Dialog component for editing existing expense entries with form fields for amount, category, description, and date.
frontend/src/components/ExpenseForm.tsx: Form component for adding new expenses with predefined and custom categories, amount input, description textarea, and date picker.
frontend/src/components/ExpenseList.tsx: Displays a sorted list of expenses for a given month/year with edit and delete actions, including confirmation dialogs.
frontend/src/components/MonthlySummary.t: Dashboard component displaying three cards with monthly earnings, total expenses, and calculated savings/overspending with percentage indicators.
frontend/src/components/MonthYearSelecto: Reusable selector component with dropdowns for choosing month and year (current year Â±5 years range).
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance based on Internet Identity authentication state, invalidating dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity persistence, and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for expense and earnings CRUD operations (add, update, delete, get) and monthly savings calculations, with automatic cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes using OKLCH color space, defining design tokens for UI components.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query client and Internet Identity provider, then renders the root App component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending the default theme with custom colors (using OKLCH), typography, animations, and design system tokens for a financial tracking UI.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking implemented features for a monthly expenditure tracker including expense forms, earnings management, category breakdowns, and dashboard UI with warm visual design.
